Live Sessions - Regular.description: Regular courses ensures deep understanding of the concepts

1-on-1.desc: This program contains 1 teacher teaching only 1 student. Program works best for fullfilling special needs and requirements of the child.

1-on-2.desc: This program contains 1 teacher teaching only 2 students. Program works best for fullfilling special needs and requirements of the child.

Short Batch.desc: This program contains a batch of less than 9 students. Students are not more than 7 so that each student also receives individual attention while also has company of some other students to compete with.
